name: Gonna Tell My Kids This Was 2020
name_original: Gonna Tell My Kids This Was 2020
description:
In the final hours before quarantine lock down panic buy enough supplies to last you, you will need Toilet Paper, Food, Water  and Hand Wash.

The more supplys you return home before the 12 hour clock run's out the longer survival and higher score.

Utilize the local shop's, business and any other stockpiles you can get your hands on, to fill your car / trolley to fill your garage.

In these crazy times, try avoid panicing the gun toating locals, last thing you want to do is start a riot and get your self killed.

Features
  • Multiple Driveable Cars 
  • Multiple Weapons
  • Virus Spread simulation 
  • Looting with item management
  • Ragdoll physics 
  • Traffic System
